blog.name: bakubooms
blog.title: 私が来た！
blog.description: nsfw / hot takes blog

summary: okay now i have to rant about slytherin!bakugou, the true evil here bakugou katsuki is in absolutely no ways a slytherin. i feel...
body:
okay now i have to rant about slytherin!bakugou, the true evil here

bakugou katsuki is in absolutely no ways a slytherin. i feel so embarrassed when i see people insisting that because “he’s the bad guy” that he’s a slytherin. 

let’s break it down with some bullet points:

  • bakugou is not the bad guy. he and deku have a challenging and complicated history, but he is not the bad guy. he is quite literally the deuteragonist of the story, dammit! he is experiencing character growth! he’s conflicted on the inside and lashing out due to his variety of complexes. okay i won’t turn this into a meta on bakugou’s mental state but oh my god y’all…
  • okay, say it with me everyone: Slytherins Are Not Inherently Evil. most of the notorious villains tend to be slytherins, not because all slytherins are evil, but because becoming a villain requires a certain amount of cunning, which is slytherin’s defining trait. i have a comparison to explain why slytherins =/= evil. most serial killers come from some kind of fucked up background, whether it be a broken home, abuse, mental illness, etc. however, you would never say that anyone dealing with these issues are automatically serial killers, because that’s stupid, irresponsible, and vastly misunderstanding the natures of both groups your talking about. the same applies to slytherins and villains.
  • bakugou is SO lawful. he can’t talk back to teachers (and we all know he’s a lil asshole who talks back to everyone lmao), he yells at his friends (posse?) in middle school to stop smoking so it doesn’t damage his record if they’re caught, and he does well in school not even just naturally, but he studies a ton. he’s literally one of the most lawful characters in the series aside from, like, iida… @achryadaiako put it perfectly on this post of mine by saying that, “Bakugou is lawful good and no lawful anything character has ever been a slytherin.” It’s True And You Should Say It !!!!!!

i also want to add that being a lil rude and standoff-ish doesn’t immediately make someone a bad person! there are plenty of assholes-with-a-heart-of-gold characters out there that we all adore, so it’s frustrating that people don’t afford the same understand that outward actions =/= one’s actual character in all cases. this applies doubly, because clearly bakugou is Going Through Some Shit and affects his ability to interact with and relate to others in a way that is immediately recognizable as “good,” but you only need to do a bit of digging! that’s why, despite his history with kacchan, deku still works to get to the root of what’s up with kacchan, and damn if he doesn’t still consider them friends.

also i should point out the reason why i feel like a lot of people place him in slytherin other than that he’s kind of an asshole: “bakugou is super ambitious!”

guess what? that means NOTHING in this scenario. if you’re going to place characters into slytherin based solely on the presence of ambition, that Literally Every Character At UA, Every Pro Hero, Etc. Is A Slytherin !!!!! of COURSE bakugou’s ambitious: he’s a student at UA high school, trying to be a pro hero! all of the students at UA are ambitious! you don’t even want to go to UA, let alone get in, unless you’re mega-ambitious compared to your average joe.

ALSO!! it’s been established in the canon of hp (which, okay, I know, but just hear me out) that people can have Major Character Traits from multiple houses, and that it’s only the strongest traits that actually determine where you get placed. all of the major hp characters in gryffindor are meant to portray other houses, but they wound up in gryffindor because they were more brave than anything else

  • harry represents slytherin, through both his literal speaking to snakes, and though lack of shits to give about any rules ever
  • hermione represents ravenclaw, because she’s extremely smart, both in the traditional understanding, as well as being incredibly intuitive
  • ron represents hufflepuff. he’s sort of an outsider, even in his own family, because all of his siblings are either popular, smart, successful, etc. he’s just the bumbling kid brother. even his little sister ginny is special because she’s the only girl! but he’s kind, and even if he fights with someone, his loyalty always, always brings him back to those he cares about.

sorry, i got a lil emotional about ron there

SO ANYWAY just because bakugou (and literally all the other other characters) are super-ambitious, it doesn’t automatically make them into slytherins

okay i’m ending this because i meant it to be just a few short paragraphs, not a whole-ass meta

summary: With all these things about the HP characters being said by her, I kinda figured JKR was desperate to stay in the spotlight...
body:
With all these things about the HP characters being said by her, I kinda figured JKR was desperate to stay in the spotlight after Harry Potter completely ended. Especially when she came out after 7 books and 8 movies to say that the t in Voldemort was silent, making it Voldemor.

Like… She went through all the movies with the main villain’s name being mispronounced and didn’t say anything? No honey, you just want to be relevant again and it really, really shows.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Fantasy AU. Tom has been studying magic under the Great Wizard Grindelwald for years, when one day he was followed home...
body: Prompt: Fantasy AU. Tom has been studying magic under the Great Wizard Grindelwald for years, when one day he was followed home by a large snake. The snake seemed friendly enough, and acted as a companion during his studies. Then one day, Tom transformed into his animagus form in front of the snake. “So that’s how you do it,” the snake said, and promptly transformed into a boy with black hair and green eyes.

summary:

Gryffindor: I KNEW I FORGOT...

summary: gamble on this - сыграть на этом
title: gamble on this - сыграть на этом
description:
by Silwery_Wind

Обычный поход по магазинам приводит к неожиданным открытиям - как для Тома, так и для Гарри. Что может быть лучше, чем доверие между друзьями?

Words: 1672, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Русский

Series: Part 6 of this ain’t no fairytale - это вам не сказка

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

blog.name: guardian-of-hope
blog.title: Gateway To Hope
blog.description: Home of Jo Grix aka Guardian of Hope, mostly an author, occasionally an artist.  Random reblogs, Power Rangers, Supernatural, Narnia, Star Wars, Star Trek, and I'm not sure what else I might decide I like. Occasional notes, quotes and images related to my original work as well.

summary: There is no emotion - Chapter 1 - Guardian_of_Hope - Star Wars - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]

description:

Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

Fate has sent the Avatar of Magic to the Jedi Council to make a special request, to take in and train a young boy as a Jedi. Who will Harry Potter become, trained as a Jedi, but with a legacy of magic.

blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
Sirius: Whenever I’m sad, I think about how the Welsh word for microwave is popty ping.
Remus: That...that helps.
body:

Remus: That...that helps.

blog.name: incorrect-professors
blog.title: incorrect hogwarts professor quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by the professors of hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry. (brought to you by the admins of incorrect-marauders.)

summary:
McGonagall: (walking by Sirius and James) I'll see you gentlemen in detention. 
James: Why, Professor? What did we do?...
body:
McGonagall: (walking by Sirius and James) I'll see you gentlemen in detention. 
James: Why, Professor? What did we do? 
McGonagall: Something in a previous life, I'm sure.
Sirius: ... Fair enough.

dialogue.name: McGonagall
dialogue.label: McGonagall:
dialogue.phrase: (walking by Sirius and James) I'll see you gentlemen in detention.

dialogue.name: James
dialogue.label: James:
dialogue.phrase: Why, Professor? What did we do?

dialogue.name: McGonagall
dialogue.label: McGonagall:
dialogue.phrase: Something in a previous life, I'm sure.

blog.name: plaidpuppyeyes
blog.title: thanks, it's the anxiety
blog.description:
--Asexual--She/Her--Hufflepuff--ENFJ--Clumsy--Procrastinator--

I am a Christian and my faith is important to me. I believe that showing love and acceptance to people is an enormous part of that. I love and accept all people of all gender identities and sexualities.

Send me ranty asks about anything you see me reblogging and I will happily rant back to you. 
My askbox is always open for whatever you need.

Header by @fiona-catherine

summary: I am so excited because my students keep talking to me about Harry Potter. They found out that I love it and must have told each...
body:
I am so excited because my students keep talking to me about Harry Potter. They found out that I love it and must have told each other because like 5 different kids have told me that they’re reading the series and they think they’re getting me off topic but the joke’s on them because they’re talking to me about literary structure, character development, plot, and foreshadowing and they don’t even realize it.

They are getting excited about reading and I am so here for it.

blog.name: books-and-cookies
blog.title: Books are friends, not food
blog.description:
Mary, 30, a lady who has a cottage in a forest and who may or may not be a witch and have the answers to life and everything (lol no, my motto is fake it till you make it). I have loved books ever since I was a little girl. If I could spend my whole day reading, I would. Life unfortunately gets in the way. It's rude, really.

2019 Reading Challenge

Mary has read 3 books toward her goal of 55 books.
